Data.text_description:
The probability of amount of exercise being ample (A=1) is 0.6154. 
For those with amount of exercise being little (A=0), the probability of physical fitness level being good (B=1) is 0.5036. 
For those with amount of exercise being ample (A=1), the probability of physical fitness level being good (B=1) is 0.5756. 
For those with physical fitness level being poor (B=0), the probability of overall health being good (C=1) is 0.0916. 
For those with physical fitness level being good (B=1), the probability of overall health being good (C=1) is 0.2137. 
For those with overall health being poor (C=0), the probability of life expectancy being long (D=1) is 0.7376. 
For those with overall health being good (C=1), the probability of life expectancy being long (D=1) is 0.9905.
